issue.title: LSF_UNIT_FOR_LIMITS not used for resource requests

content.raw:
On our system the select statement uses the LSF_UNIT_FOR_LIMITS, which in
our case is GB; I guess this is what the doc you cite refers to.

I guess I don't know per se what it's requesting, but for everything else I
use GB size requests (i.e. select[mem>8] identifies nodes with 8 GB
available), and segway jobs won't run with the setting at 2148; changing to
GB in cluster.lsf.py lets them run.

--
Jay Hesselberth
